Class Character

java.lang.Object
  Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
CaveWorker
Direct Known Subclasses:
Adventurer, Filler, Miner
public abstract class Character
extends Object
implements CaveWorker

Class to store information about a general game character. Implements the CaveWorker class which defines special operations on a cave, depending on the type of character.

Author:
YOU

          The Cave that this character is occupying.

Field Detail

location

protected Cave location
The Cave that this character is occupying.

Constructor Detail

Character

public Character(Cave initLoc)
Construct a new character at the initial location. Marks this location as occupied.

Method Detail

getLocation

public Cave getLocation()
Get the Cave this character is occupying.

move

public boolean move(Cave to)
Move this character from his/her current location to the new location. Marks the old spot as unoccupied and the new spot as occupied. Assumes that new location can be moved to by this character.

Parameters:
to - The new location to move to.
Returns:
true (see overridden methods below for when not to return true).

getName

public abstract String getName()
Abstract method to get the name of this character. Any non-abstract class must implement this method.
